ygData.subject: Help wanted!
ygData.msgSnippet: I died in a strange manner this noon in the mino caves of the Steamfont mountains, from Meldrath (or however it s spelled) and his guards... I m gonna try to
ygData.messageBody:
I died in a strange manner this noon in the mino caves of the Steamfont mountains, from Meldrath (or however it's spelled) and his guards...

I'm gonna try to get my corpse back tonight, and am willing to accept any advice or help one can provide.

I think it should be around 6:30pm, PST, so if one of you is willing to drop by and help, you'll be welcome!

Else some email advice would be great too.

Thormael, Wood Elf Ranger, Level 12, as naked as a worm
